caption: Excellent food! Welcoming attitude! You feel home even at the curbside:) If the price looks a little bit high you can totally share one sandwich for two people...specially that it comes with a side.
The Cuban was amazing, thak you to the staff for recommending it to me, this was my first time here and I'll definitely be coming back.
Fantastic first visit to this cute little place with amazing soups. The aroma drew us in from the street. The truffle pumpkin soup is amazing.

I went here last week. This is my 2nd week here and if my car was fixed, I would come here everyday. This place has a very homey feel. The staff are very friendly and amazing. The food is delicious and the snacks are on point! I am vegan, so there is nothing wrong I can say about this place! I am obsessed with the mac and cheese and banana chocolate cupcakes. Other than that, the music they play is also on point. Words cannot describe this place. Go try it out for yourself! The money here is worth every penny!!!

Happy Birthday Date Night to Me! My +1 surprised me with a impromptu date night under the Brooklyn Bridge. I had eaten the Vodega food prior at Vegan Fest and was excited to get to try even more items! We were the last customers of the evening arriving about 30mins before close. We ordered: Chopped Cheese, Philly Cheesesteak, Smashed Potatoes, Mac & Cheese, Tomato Salad, Chili, Corn Chowder, Moroccan Stew, Banana Pudding, Cookies, and a few bags of chips and snacks. We went back to the car and threw down! The chopped cheese was beyond! The smashed potatoes with ranch on the side was bomb! Chilli delish, Mac & Cheese needed just a little something...but it was creamy(we gave it the hook-up back at the house). I can't wait to go back for a pt.2. That tomato salad was the surprise of the night, salty/spicy/umami fresh! I added it to some kale the next day and enjoyed it all over again! He knows what he's doing. May have to head over sooner than I planned, typing this makes me want a chopped cheese right now!!

It sounds amazing to me because I’m Muslim and eat only halal meat and in New York City it’s hard to find halal bodega spot but this place makes everything vegan makes me happy to try non meat sandwiches..
Food is awesome.  I never had anything like it before.  vegan Philly cheese steak and smoked Mac and cheese.  Very very good.  Will return for more.

Really impressed with the falafel! He made a bowl for me because I didnt want a hoagie sandwich and it was great... will definitely come back again for the falafel. Smashed potato side also good and the side sauces were great (sweet ketchup and a spicy sauce)

As a chef who has transitioned to a plant base diet in her adult life, there are a few items from my meat eating days that I crave but have yet to successfully replicate or find. One of those is a Cuban sandwich. When I saw Vodega offers a Cuban, I was hesitant to try it because I didn’t want to be let down by another food item trying to be something it isn’t aka another “vegan fail”. But I decided to give Vodega a chance because what do I have to loose. After my first bite of Vodega’s Cuban literal tears rolled down my face, it was that good!! I could go on and on but moral of the story, I HIGHLY recommend the Cuban sandwich.

Stopped by for lunch today and got a chopped cheese with potato smashies (these were really, really good!). The portion sizes are generous — I didn’t need my afternoon snack today. Excited to come back and try something else. Definitely check it out for great vegan and vegetarian food!

I’m so happy I found this place!!! I’ve been looking for an amazing vegan spot for so long and it just a block from the office. The sandwiches and the desserts are to die for. The Reuben sandwich was so creatively done tastes spectacular and the homemade sauerkraut is mouth watering. Also a must the banana pudding! I can’t recommend this place enough.

I waited an hour and a half for this order from Grubhub but it was totally worth it. The sandwich was amazing and the potatoes are some of the best potatoes I ever had. Also the banana pudding crack. Not too too sweet. Hits the spot. Glad I ordered.
As a non-vegan, I love this place.  Their sandwiches are fantastic.  Their take on the Cuban is inspired!
Amazing sandwiches and sides and a friendly staff. No space to sit down, but a great quick grab that is worth every penny. Cannot wait to go back.
Ummm AMAZING. Period. Chopped cheese for the massive win!!

This place is amazing. The workers are great, the store is so cute and intimate. They’re very eco friendly, i love it. AND THE FOOD. WOW. I got the chopped cheese (I believe it’s all vegetarian and can be vegan if you ask) and it was not disappointed. I loved every bite. The potato smashes were great, my friend is sensitive to spice so she said it was a bit spicy but still very good. I didn’t think it was spicy but then again, I do eat spicy foods so do what you want with that info. Definitely making this my go to whenever I’m in Williamsburg/Dumbo area!!
Jackfruit cuban with hummus and veggies, or smoked mac and cheese is amazing.
Vegan Philly Cheesesteaks are already hard to find. Needless to say I was so excited to see this on their menu.

What a welcome space into our lives. Plant based kindness with a bodega twist. They're open for take out and delivery only during Covid. I can't wait for this space to thrive once we're done with Covid.
I enjoyed the Chop Cheese and Smashies. I will definitely return soon!!
The chopped cheese is wonderful, as is everything else. A must go and go back.
Yummy vegan comfort food, from a chef who takes pride in his work and genuinely cares about your experience.

I thoroughly enjoyed everything I ordered from here.  The Cuban sandwich, the Mac n cheese, and the jack fruit ceviche were amazing.  The chef genuinely loves what he does and he is super friendly!  Definitely will be eating here again.
Great vegan food for people that are not too much into vegan food! jackfruit sandwich is the best! tastes and fills like pulled pork 😅

New addition to the neighborhood and it’s really very good!! Just ordered a chopped cheese and the cuban, both were delicious. Couldn’t believe they were vegetarian. The hoagie was very fresh. Sides were also very good (mac and cheese, jeweled grains)..will definitely be ordering from here again!
I love love love this place! Great food for a picnic in the nearby park. Had a delicious  sandwich and tomato salad
Excellent, friendly service and most of all, delicious vegan dishes. Highly recommended

Just stumbled upon this place walking around Dumbo today and it’s definitely a great new vegan option in an area without many. Had the Cubano with Mac and Cheese, which was really excellent. The portions are generous and the food was made fresh and took just a couple of minutes to get. Will definitely visit again.
